## Intro

Use this document to suggest discussion topics or questions for each week. Make sure to list your name after each question/topic you add (see example below). Please do not delete anyone else's contribution; you can add information or suggest edits after each question.

## Week 2 (Feb 6 - Feb 12)

+ (Melissa Crow): What are some questions/topics you might be interested in asking?
+ (Melissa Crow): What are some units of analysis you would like to focus on (books, chapters, lines, authors, genres)? The unit of analysis is usually equivalent to the row in a spreadsheet.
